articles.description: The Indian Premier League is suspended for one week amid the ongoing tensions between India and neighbouring Pakistan.
articles.title: Indian Premier League suspended for one week amid India-Pakistan tension

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot is "disappointed" to be losing "a very good full-back" in Trent Alexander-Arnold and hints that the England international is set to join Real Madrid.
articles.title: Liverpool boss Arne Slot on Trent Alexander-Arnold future - 'we both know where he's going'

articles.description: Maro Itoje says his experience of two previous British and Irish Lions tours will help him captain the team on his third.
articles.title: Maro Itoje: British and Irish Lions captain on maturing into captain role

articles.description: All the latest Europa League and Conference League reaction as Tottenham, Manchester United and Chelsea all win to reach finals.
articles.title: Europa League and Conference League: Tottenham, Man Utd and Chelsea all reach finals

articles.description: Chelsea fans are asked to submit evidence to support concerns over their safety at Thursday's Conference League semi-final after Djurgarden fans had tickets for home sections of Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Djugarden fans in Chelsea sections at Stamford Bridge - fans asked for evidence over safety concerns

articles.description: Former Australia cricketer Stuart MacGill avoids jail after being found guilty of  taking part in the supply of cocaine.
articles.title: Stuart MacGill: Former Australia cricketer avoids jail over drug deal

articles.description: When Manchester United and Tottenham face off it will be the sixth all-English final in a major European competition - with half of them involving Spurs.
articles.title: Man Utd v Tottenham in Europea League final: All-English final in Bilbao with Champions League on line

articles.description: The Minnesota Timberwolves cruise to a 117-93 win over the Golden State Warriors to level their NBA Western Conference semi-final at 1-1 on Thursday evening.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Golden State's Steph Curry watches his Warriors lose at Timberwolves

articles.description: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah and Arsenal striker Alessia Russo win the Football Writers' Association awards for men's and women's player of the season.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah and Alessia Russo win FWA player of the year awards

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on grime stars Footsie and Strategy with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v grime stars Footsie & Strategy
